messages.content: You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information about the 7 Day Hybrid package.
What does the 7 Day Hybrid package include?
Can you tell me what's offered in the 7 Day Hybrid package?
What are the benefits of the Telenor 7 Day Hybrid package?

The 7 Day Hybrid package offers 3000 MBs of internet, 1500 Telenor & PTCL minutes, 80 offnet minutes, and 1500 SMS for Rs. 87 including tax. The package can be subscribed by dialing *345*79# and is valid for 7 days.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information about the 7 Day Hybrid package.
How can I activate the 7 Day Hybrid package?
What is the method to subscribe to the 7 Day Hybrid package?
How do I get the 7 Day Hybrid package?
You can activate the 7 Day Hybrid package by dialing *345*79#. The package is valid for 7 days and offers a variety of benefits including internet, on-net and off-net minutes, and SMS.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information about the 7 Day Hybrid package.
Who is eligible for the 7 Day Hybrid package?
Can all Telenor customers subscribe to the 7 Day Hybrid package?
What are the eligibility criteria for the 7 Day Hybrid package?
The 7 Day Hybrid package is available to users who joined the network in the last 90 days. All Telenor Prepaid customers within this timeframe are eligible.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information about the 7 Day Hybrid package.
How long is the 7 Day Hybrid package valid?
What is the validity period of the 7 Day Hybrid package?
For how many days does the 7 Day Hybrid package remain active?
The 7 Day Hybrid package is valid for 7 days from the date of subscription. Subscribers will be notified once the package expires.
